fields.text: Thank you for calling Ridecell in San Francisco, the world’s most intelligent mobility platform.
For sales, partnership opportunities, and account setup, press [INDEX].
If you’re interested in fleet management solutions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a fleet management specialist.
If you’d like information on pricing and custom quotes, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we route you to our pricing and quotes team.
For technical support and service inquiries, press [INDEX].
If you need help with platform setup or operations, press [INDEX].
Please stay on the line while we forward you to technical support.
If you have questions about API integration or developer support, press [INDEX].
Thank you for holding, we’ll connect you to our developer support team shortly.
